item.title: Mutiple vans causing obstruction, 1st February
item.description:
Number of vans parked on corner of Boundary Road causing obstruction when crossing the road or trying to maneuver a vehicle round bend. Vans sometimes illegally park on pavements too if lack of space. These vans do not belong to the residents of Boundary Road. It is being used as a commercial car park for surrounding area. Can the double yellow lines be continued round bend to eliminate the obstruction and potential accident.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 81, Boundary Road, Falconwood, Sidcup, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: More dog poo on the pavement, 1st February
